alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 2:19PM CDT until April 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAKOTA...CENTRAL GOODHUE AND SOUTHWESTERN PIERCE COUNTIES... At 218 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cannon Falls, or 15 miles east of Northfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goodhue, Welch and Red Wing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
